cause.description:
PERTHES DISEASE * Also known as Avascular Necrosis * Potentially a crippling disease in the hip * Affects 5 per 100,000 children between ages of 12 and 15
1. Raising money for sufferers of Perthes.
2. Raising money for the families of Perthes sufferers.
3. Spreading the word about Perthes Disease
4. Spreading the word on how others can help.
cause.name: Support Perthes Research!
